item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 8 months of OCaml after 8 years of Haskell in production (25 points | 4 comments)
2. Show HN: Copper – Open-source robotics in Rust with deterministic log replay (45 points | 6 comments)
3. Fish have a brain microbiome – could humans have one too? (192 points | 81 comments)
4. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (237 points | 201 comments)
5. Accelerated AI Inference via Dynamic Execution Methods (25 points | discuss)
6. World Labs: Generate 3D worlds from a single image (303 points | 108 comments)
7. Bioluminescent wood using the white rot fungus desarmillaria tabescens (81 points | 14 comments)
8. Show HN: Open-sourced (road) traffic counting application (35 points | 8 comments)
9. Optimality of Gerver's Sofa (70 points | 15 comments)
10. Evidence of the use of silk by Bronze Age civilization (116 points | 43 comments)
11. .NET Support on Heroku (27 points | 10 comments)
12. A better approach to gravity: how we made EGM2008 faster (39 points | 9 comments)
13. Every board game rulebook is awful [pdf] (193 points | 189 comments)
14. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (December 2024) (92 points | 187 comments)
15. Unlocking the power of time-series data with multimodal models (86 points | 19 comments)
16. Intel announces retirement of Pat Gelsinger (763 points | 613 comments)
17. Ethiopian wolves reported to feed on nectar (30 points | 9 comments)
18. Show HN: Flow – A dynamic task engine for building AI agents (61 points | 19 comments)
19. A Collection of Kaleidoscope Schemes, Sourced from the WayBack Machine. (7 points | 1 comment)
20. Learn perfect pitch in 15 years (70 points | 56 comments)
21. Murderbot, she wrote (172 points | 126 comments)
22. The world of Dante's Divine Comedy (57 points | 31 comments)
23. Kenya and "the decline of the greatest coffee" (2021) (163 points | 130 comments)
24. Black Hole Puzzle (43 points | 39 comments)
25. Show HN: SeekStorm – open-source sub-millisecond search in Rust (137 points | 32 comments)
26. Show HN: Automate your studio – mute a mixer channel to turn your PTZ camera (49 points | 15 comments)
27. The zoology and biochemistry of xenomorphs from the Alien franchise (101 points | 64 comments)
28. The Sperry Rand Corporation (52 points | 24 comments)
29. Facebook's Little Red Book (347 points | 176 comments)
30. The Rock VX Gas Canister Build (2022) (100 points | 46 comments)
